The LifeForce, 85 gram, is labeled in parts: "***SPICY SPROUTS***a blend of clover and radish sprouts***LifeForce***KEEP REFRIGERATED***NET WT 85g***PRODUCED FOR: LIFE FORCE FOODS LLC, BALTIMORE, MD 21202***www.BroccoSprouts.com***".
reason_for_recall: Spicy Sprouts are recalled due to a potential contamination with Listeria monocytogenes.
code_info: The Best by Dates are including all and up to 2/17/2013
